name: Upload Rejected Even After Correct Size Explainer
problemStatement: My photo is exactly 50KB but the portal still says 'Invalid File' or 'Rejected'. Why?
whatUsersUsuallyDoWrong: Ignoring internal metadata (EXIF) that portals use for security verification.
Manually renaming .png to .jpg without actual binary conversion.
Upload while on a slow network which causes binary corruption.
